column1: 1. “Great attitude is like a perfect cup of coffee – don’t start your day without it. Good morning.”

2. “Old friends pass away, new friends appear. It is just like the days. An old day passes, a new day arrives. The important thing is to make it meaningful: a meaningful friend – or a meaningful day.”
3. “Set a goal that makes you want to jump out of bed in the morning.”
4. If you feel the blue early in the morning,Then take a deep sigh,And say this is just a wonderful day,Where you would have your say,So, stay blessed,I wish you a lovely morning!
5. “If you’re going to do something tonight that you’ll be sorry for tomorrow morning, sleep late.”
6. “Some days you just have to create your own sunshine”
7. “Be pleasant until ten o’clock in the morning and the rest of the day will take care of itself.”
8. “Everyday may not be good, BUT There is SOMETHING GOOD in Every day.”
9. “Prayer is the key of the morning and the bolt of the evening.”
10. “Good thoughts precede great deeds. Great deeds precede success. Have a great day.”
11. “When you start each day with a grateful heart…”
12. “Your journey will be much lighter and easier if you don’t carry your past with you.”
13. “You are the first thing to enter my mind in the morning and the last thing to leave my heart at night.”
14. . “I opened two gifts this morning. They were my eyes.”
15. “Lose an hour in the morning, and you will spend all day looking for it.”
